divs: Sighting DetailsME AND ANOTHER 3 FRIENDS, ONE FROM BRAZIL,AUSTRALIA AND ONE FROM MEXICO WHERE WALKING ON MY FRIEND���S BIOFARM BEFORE TAKING A MEXICAN BATH CALLED TEMAZCAL.IT WAS ALMOST AT SUNSET 6.00-6.30 PM I TOOK THE FILM FROM EAST TO WEST. YOU CAN SEE THE SUN GOING DOWN. I WAS FILMING WITH MY DIGITAL CAMERA, KODAK 8 MP. WITH HD VIDEO. I COULD HEAR OR SEE NOTHING BUT, AFTER I FINISHED AND TRANSFERED IT TO MY PC. I ANALIZED WITH QUICKTIME PLAYER AND YOU CAN SEE ALL THOSE UFOS IN THE FILM THERE ARE CILINDERS, ROUNDS AND BULLETS LIKE, THEY SEEM TO KNOW THAT I WAS FILMING BECAUSE THEY FLEW IN FRONT OF MY CAMERA. IT IS A UFO DANCING, ITS FANTASTIC. I COULD ESTIMATE THEIR SPEED: 2500-12,000 KMS PER HOUR. THAT IS ALMOST 2 TO 4 MILES PER SECOND! THAT IS THE REASON WE CAN NOT SEE THEM, OUR HUMAN EYE IS NOT THAT FAST,!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Atlixco
